script.name: Cmd.Anarkis.Refuel
script.description: Auto prep ships: refuel energy cells if required

line.comment: * Find nearest factory that sells ecells - don't care much about price
* Search for stations only in sectors not yet searched
* Get array of stations to be found
* Remove all stations not selling energy cells
* Remove all stations, if docking of ship is not possible
* Check all conditions needed for refuelling

line.text: '%sHas only %s energy cells aboard, needs another %s cells, trys to buy at %s'

line.comment: * Before jumping anywhere, check for any ADS ships not yet docked - or any MARS drones still doing anything, wait for them to dock
*if not [THIS]-> is in same sector as $station
* Fly to station (or jump, if enough energy cells aboard)
* Refuel with 3x needed ecells, so ship doesn't have to refuel again for a while (leave at least 50 units cargospace free)
* Check all conditions needed for refuelling after arrivig in sector

line.text: '%sArrived in sector %s, final amount of energy sells to be purchased is: %s. Flying to station %s.'

line.comment: * Check amount of energy cells after refueling; if ship didn't refuel up to at least the needed resupply quantity, return false

line.text: '%sRefuelling finished; at least %s energy cells ought to have been bought, has %s in cargo bay'

sval.val: Auto prep ships: refuel energy cells if required
Lib.refuel
%sHas only %s energy cells aboard, needs another %s cells, trys to buy at %s
%sArrived in sector %s, final amount of energy sells to be purchased is: %s. Flying to station %s.
%sRefuelling finished; at least %s energy cells ought to have been bought, has %s in cargo bay
LU Update (Solarahawk): removed player code
Get setup
Find nearest factory that sells ecells - don't care much about price
Search for stations only in sectors not yet searched
Get array of stations to be found
Remove all stations not selling energy cells
Remove all stations, if docking of ship is not possible
Check all conditions needed for refuelling
Before jumping anywhere, check for any ADS ships not yet docked - or any MARS drones still doing anything, wait for them to dock
if not [THIS]-> is in same sector as $station
do if $Grid
= [THIS]-> call script 'Cmd.Anarkis.ADS.Autocarrier.Wait' : Wait.For.Drones=[TRUE]
Fly to station (or jump, if enough energy cells aboard)
Refuel with 3x needed ecells, so ship doesn't have to refuel again for a while (leave at least 50 units cargospace free)
Check all conditions needed for refuelling after arrivig in sector
Check amount of energy cells after refueling; if ship didn't refuel up to at least the needed resupply quantity, return false
